column4: so i'm trying to setup a ubuntu vm.  I'm at the install setup right now.  When I enter a name for the computer it says "This name already exists on the network." what's up with that and what can I do about it?
unless there really is another machine by that name, keep going
name it what you were planning to and ignore the message... it'll be ok
no problem... happened to me recently & hasn't caused a problem when I ignored the message
